name: Spirits Got Spook
description:
Mash these buttons repeatedly and check your spook score. Beware! The controls will switch every 10 seconds! Made for the Becker IGDA 6 hour Halloween Jam

Controls:

Enter/Space to go boo.

Left / Left Control to wiggle arms.

Right / Left Alt to waggle tail.

The Enter, Left, and Right keys are always the first keys
